name: Delete an Email from Platform from Thirdpane message workflow

steps.instruction: PRE-REQUISITE: Client property for Email should be enabled
Add GMAIL column by seleting the Account name.
Click on delete for a particular message from thirdpane message workflow
steps.expected: The message should be deleted from message cell

steps.instruction: Verify from channel for is the post is deleted
steps.expected: In channel the the deleted post should not be seen
